Nightstar saw them and she didn't knows if she had to go where they 
are or she had to wait. She was to closest that if she moved they 
could see her...

So that She decides stayed there until she knew who were them... 
Enemies or Friends.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Agent 2 walks toward the location where the small ship was about to 
land. He stands by it and smiles. ANother bot comes out and hugs 
Agent 2 suddenly.
> 
> "I'm here. Don't tell me that's your base?" Agent 5 says.
> 
> "Yeah. Hey, where's Agent 4?" Agent 2 asks.
> 
> "He didn't make it, we got into a fight. He got his brains blown 
out. How about Agent 1 and Agent 3?" Agent 5 asks.
> 
> "Their ship got blown up. We're the last 2." Agent 2 says.
> 
> "That totally lacks coolness." Agent 5 says.
> 
> "It is loaded with Heinosity." Agent 2 says.
> 
> "Like in that movie. What was the name of it again?" Agent 5 says.
> 
> "I thought it was in a video game?" Agent 2 says.
> 
> "Maybe so. Hey, who's that?" Agent 5 asks. Agent 2 withdraws his 
blaster.
> 
> "I don't know yet, he needs to answer me." Agent 2 says. He waits 
for an answer from Soundwave...
